citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:50p on
25-Sep-18.ACI Bartels arrived at the facility and spoke with a family member. They advised that the licensee was
not available.
**This report was delivered at the pilot announced inspection.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:50p on
25-Sep-18.ACI Bartels arrived at the facility and spoke with a family member.  They advised that the licensee was
not available.  
**This report was delivered at the pilot announced inspection.
